name: Shifting rooms
description:
Explore the rooms and escape.

Made for Mini Jam 126

Tips
  • Unlock the door by interacting with the grandfather clock in one of the bedrooms.
  • Placing sand causes the room to no longer shift around. Use this to create a path from the clock to the exit.
  • If you somehow become stuck in the same few rooms, try moving through the same door a bunch of times and try a new door after some time (it is a bad workaround, but i didn't have time to sove this issue properly :P)
